snippet.title: Card-en-Ciel - Project Kickoff Trailer
snippet.description:
Glitch your way to victory!
A card-battling RPG adventure through the eras of gaming - now in development!
Official site: https://card-en-ciel.com/en/
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2730540/CardenCiel/

Card-en-Ciel is a roguelite card-battling RPG with an expansive scope, featuring over 300 cards and 50 songs starring Neon, a self-proclaimed "gaming detective."

Adventure through over 10 different dungeons, earning character cards to strengthen your deck and unlock new techniques to use in ever-expanding roguelite card battles. Meet the conditions of special Muse Cards and they'll sing songs in battle that activate special effects! 

Use these powerful song abilities, hidden card "glitches", and even your enemies' attacks against them to perform satisfying, full power combos!

Look for more information about Neon’s battles through the eras of gaming coming soon!

Platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5
　　　　　Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Steam (PC) 　
Genre: Card-battling RPG
Rating: Pending
Players: 1-2
Release Date: TBA
Price: TBA


© INTI CREATES CO., LTD. 2024 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
